column5: Has anyone been to North Spirit Lake in NW Ontario? I would like to hear how the pike and walleye fishing is there.

Way late I know Been to North Spirit twice. Would love to go again. Two large lakes with river between them. One nice deep portage lake with lake trout. The owners are great. We fished for walleye and would catch several in the 25Â” range during each week trip. There are huge weed beds that looked really good for pike. My favorite spot just a long way from central Illinois
